metaData.description: This data entity provides meta data about the first mile farm data
metaData.title: Meta_data

00_exportDate.description: Date when the data has been exported from the database into first-mile-farm-data-schema
00_exportDate.title: Export date

01_dataProvidersID.description: Legal registration number of the organisation that converted its data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
01_dataProvidersID.title: Legal registration number of the data provider

02_dataProvidersName.description: Official name of the organisation that converted its data into First Mile Data Format
02_dataProvidersName.title: data provider name

03_dataProvidersGeolocation.description: Location of the frontdoor of head office of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schemaindicated by WGS84 Lat-Long Coordinates ddd.dddd
03_dataProvidersGeolocation.title: Geolocation of the data provider

04_datasetDescription.description: Description of the data set that is converted into first-mile-farm-data-schema
04_datasetDescription.title: Dataset description

05_dataProvidersPointofContact.description: Contact point of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
05_dataProvidersPointofContact.title: data provider point of contact

06_dataProvidersAdress.description: The legally registered address of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema.
06_dataProvidersAdress.title: data providers lega; adress
